tvdTop module¶

File: tvdTop.py Created: 26/08/2014

@author: Francesco Ciaccia, Jarkko K

Description:
Service class used to compute the service graph to be passed to the Orchestrator, starting from the profileType json file received. It includes also methods used by the internal logic of the PSC to store and retrieve info about the TVD topology.
class tvdTop.tvdTop(sg_dict)[source]¶
resolveTVDtop(proType)[source]¶

Right now the TVD resolution logic is a dumb reformatting of the profileType file The only valid modification is the added unique TVDid
